content.description:
Image 1

Raphael, Italian artist, Portrait of Pope Julius II, 1511

In the Public Domain

Image 2

Raphael, Italian artist, portrait of Heraclitus of Ephesus, an ancient Greek philosopher, part of a larger painting called The School of Athens, 1511

In the Public Domain
content.question: The portrait of Heraclitus best reflects which of the following features of the Italian Renaissance?

choices.label: The challenge to the power of universities
The continued interest in religious themes
The revival of interest in classical works

content.answer: The revival of interest in classical works

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
